clusters.name: Core JavaScript Fundamentals
clusters.description: This cluster covers foundational concepts in JavaScript, essential for any frontend developer. **Important Note: The full metadata (title, type, prerequisites, complexity, etc.) for the items was not provided in the input. The content and ordering of these items are based on a plausible assumption of generic, foundational JavaScript topics given their IDs and the context of frontend interviews. This is an illustrative example of how the data would be structured if the full metadata were available.**

items.reason: Assumed to be an introduction to JavaScript's basic building blocks, such as variables, data types, and fundamental operators. This knowledge is foundational for understanding all subsequent JavaScript concepts.

Assumed to be about JavaScript functions. Building upon the understanding of variables and data types (from the previous item), functions are a core concept for organizing code, defining reusable blocks, and understanding control flow, making them a natural next step in foundational JS learning.
